title: Nene
desc: Pico's self-proclaimed girlfriend. Are they actually dating? Pico claims not, but wherever Pico is, Nene isn't too far behind. On the rare occasion she's not with Pico, she's probably out on a murder spree. Even if she's a hyper intelligent serial murderer, she does care for her friends, sometimes.

cData.desc: Slightly Outdated Nene Concept by FifLeo
Slightly Outdated Key Art by EllisBros
